name: Alien Exterminator
description:
The ship has been overrun by alien entities. You've been sent down into the ship's basement to pump extermination fluid throughout the vessel.

End of semester project for the BA game design program at The Royal Danish Academy of Fine Arts Schools of Architecture, Design and Conservation.

Controls

WASD: move
LMB: interact
Space: jump
Q: quit
